mainText:
I am so distraught by the fact that this brilliant man is no longer among us.  He truly lived his life in a state of purpose and grace.  His vision, drive and creativity was so captivating. I am fortunate to have existed with him on this planet in his time to witness his world changing creativity.


The should change the dictionary to include:


Steve Jobs - Visionary
Definition:


Brightly and intensely vivid
Radiant, exceptionally clever and talented; outstanding; impressive

Synonym - Brilliant





My condolences to his family at home and at Apple.  I pray you all carry his light always.
author: Lorie
